metadata.dc:title: Modren dressings and products for externa use for the prevention and treatment of pressure score and other chronic wounds
metadata.dc:description: This article seeks to be a kind of practical guide based on the best available facts which enable a rational use to be made of different products for external use, while underlining the importance of the different financial agencies adapting their product forms to the available facts (AU)
metadata.dc:creator: Torra Bou, J. E
Castilla López, T
Robles Antúnez, Mª D
metadata.dc:title: Apósitos modernos y productos de uso tópico para la prevención y el tratamiento de las úlceras por presión y otras heridas crónicas
